1.title: Happy Heroween
1.plot: A Halloween storm occurs outside, but inside Colosso keeps the family spooked by telling three scary stories.

2.title: Thundermans: Banished!
2.plot: The Thundermans are forced to relocate to another city after their secret is revealed. However, when a new threat rises in Hiddenville, Phoebe and Max risk everything in order to save Hiddenville.

3.title: Smells Like Team Spirit
3.plot: Phoebe and Max must work together on a series of superhero team-building exercises, but their different approaches to training jeopardizes their future as a crime fighting duo.

4.title: Max to the Future
4.plot: Max is concerned that he is not considered a valuable superhero, so he creates a machine that can predict future crimes.

5.title: Better Off Wed
5.plot: When the children learn that Dr. Colosso ruined their parents' wedding years earlier, they decide to recreate Hank and Barb's dream day as their anniversary gift.

6.title: Parks & T-Rex
6.plot: While preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe and Max discover that they have forgotten special family events.

7.title: Date of Emergency
7.plot: Phoebe fakes a romance after feeling left out with her friends all in relationships, but maintaining the lie proves to be harder than she expected.

8.title: Orange Is the New Max
8.plot: Phoebe worries that Max will revert to his evil ways after he is asked to give a ''Scared Straight'' talk to a group of young super villains in prison, but her efforts to protect Max from himself end up doing more harm than good.

9.title: Ditch Perfect
9.plot: When Phoebe learns Max's band plans to dump him, she suspects that his superhero training is hurting his friendships and attempts to help repair things.

10.title: May Z-Force Be with You
10.plot: Max and Phoebe ask Cherry to secretly fill-in after Phoebe injures herself before a meeting.

11.title: 21 Dump Street
11.plot: When Max gets dumped, Phoebe tries to cheer him up by setting him up with another girl. However, the girl turns out to be an animal activist who thinks Max treats Dr. Colosso cruelly.

12.title: Super Dupers
12.plot: Max and Phoebe use their powers to give Gideon a confidence boost, but the gesture backfires when he recklessly starts to think he that he has superpowers of his own. Meanwhile, Billy and Nora accidentally break the Thunder Monitor.

13.title: Come What Mayhem
13.plot: When one of Max's old pranks threatens to ruin a superhero gathering, Phoebe and Max are unable to stop it even with their combined powers, which leads Phoebe to make a life-changing decision.

14.title: Thunder in Paradise
14.plot: The Thundermans head to Hawaii for a vacation that they planned. However, when Phoebe accidentally absorbs the evil powers of Dark Mayhem, she becomes determined to complete his plan for world domination and must be stopped.

15.title: Save the Past Dance
15.plot: Tired of hearing tales of Hiddenville's legendary mayor, the kids use a time machine to travel back 60 years to disprove the myths; but when they inadvertently alter the past, the effect is disastrous for their hometown.

16.title: Z's All That
16.plot: Phoebe and Max act as superhero mentors to one of their siblings, but quickly regret selecting Nora after seeing Billy's surprisingly impressive skill set.

17.title: Can't Hardly Date
17.plot: As Sarah and Gideon's crushes on Max and Phoebe escalate, the twins attempt to solve the problem by setting them up on a date with each other; Max wants to win back Sarah after he discovers her uncle is a rock star.

18.title: Revenge of the Smith
18.plot: Excited to be honored for their heroism with a school mural, Phoebe and Max learn that the artist holds a personal grudge,and the tribute isn't what they imagined.

19.title: Nowhere to Slide
19.plot: The Thunder family splits up for the night; the boys decide to survive 24 hours in the wilderness, while the girls try to bond over some of Barb's favorite farm activities from her childhood.

20.title: Significant Brother
20.plot: Sparks fly between Phoebe and Cherry's visiting brother, prompting Cherry to grow concerned that she will be overshadowed by this new romance; after Cherry begs Phoebe not to date her brother, Phoebe must decide between love and friendship.

21.title: Rhythm n' Shoes
21.plot: Determined to meet a famous pop singer visiting Hiddenville High, Phoebe and Max devise elaborate schemes to insert themselves into her performance that quickly lead to disastrous results.

22.title: Make It Pop Pop
22.plot: Nana and Pop Pop Thunderman come to visit, but when Phoebe reveals Colosso is living in their house, Pop Pop's no-tolerance attitude toward super villains leads him to banish Max and his bunny best friend to the Detention Zone.

23.title: Side-Kicking and Screaming
23.plot: Max and Phoebe secretly employ their parents' former sidekick to ease their busy schedule, but the twins' bickering and inability to share provokes an unexpected response from their new sidekick.

25.title: Cookie Mistake
25.plot: After Phoebe chooses Billy to accompany her to their favorite cookie factory's exclusive tasting event, Max and Nora are determined to sneak in and get to the delicious treats first.

26.title: All the President's Thunder-Men
26.plot: After their requests drive Kickbutt to quit, Max and Phoebe get what they want when Hank is named the new SuperPresident; being the First Family of the Hero League takes its toll on the family.

27.title: Mad Max: Beyond Thunderhome
27.plot: Max finally declares his independence from his parents' house rules and moves to his friend's house, where they only rule is that there are no rules; ultimate freedom quickly becomes more than Max can handle.

28.title: The Thundredth
28.plot: Phoebe and Max are determined to make their 100th save their best and most memorable one yet, but by ignoring a series of small saves they overlook a super villain plotting revenge on Hank and Barb.

29.title: Looperheroes
29.plot: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop.

30.title: The Thunder Games
30.plot: Max and Phoebe advance to the final tryout for a spot on an elite superhero squad, but a new super villain with a surprise connection to the Thunderman family may force them to sacrifice their crime fighting dream.

1.title: Adventures in Supersitting
1.plot: Phoebe and Max Thunderman appear to be regular teenagers, but they're actually superheroes. While Max embraces the dark side, Phoebe strives to be normal and use her powers for good, but can life ever be normal in this family?

2.title: Phoebe vs. Max
2.plot: After Max pranks Phoebe on Picture Day, a prank war between them gets out of hand. Meanwhile, Hank and Barb try a new parenting style to get Billy and Nora to do their share of chores.

3.title: Dinner Party
3.plot: Max plans to sabotage dinner when Phoebe invites her crush's family over in order to impress them, but when an unexpected guest arrives, Phoebe and Max have to work together to keep the evening from turning into a disaster.

4.title: Report Card
4.plot: After changing the grades on his report card and being moved into an advanced class, Max competes against Phoebe in the Math Bowl. Meanwhile, Hank, Nora, and Billy try to catch the elusive newspaper thief.

5.title: Ditch Day
5.plot: Max and Phoebe create some fun for themselves on Ditch Day.

6.title: This Looks Like a Job For...
6.plot: Max and Phoebe get jobs at a pizza parlor; and must work together to save their jobs.

7.title: Weekend Guest
7.plot: Phoebe volunteers to take the class' Venus flytrap home for the weekend; Max performs an experiment on a plant, causing it to grow continuously.

8.title: You Stole My Thunder, Man
8.plot: Phoebe plots revenge when Max wins the school election that she had been working hard for.

9.title: Weird Science Fair
9.plot: Phoebe and Max let an old rivalry get carried away while helping Billy and Nora with their school science fair projects. Meanwhile, Barb tries to catch Hank in the act after he copies her notes in book club.

10.title: Crime After Crime
10.plot: Hank creates a neighborhood watch group when crimes start happening. Max takes the blame for the mysterious crimes to hide his own secret, but Phoebe knows he is innocent and it's up to the family to catch the real criminal.

11.title: Going Wonkers
11.plot: A comet causes Phoebe and Max's powers to go wonky. They must work together to control the chaos while at their school dance.

12.title: Restaurant Crashers
12.plot: When the kids ruin Barb's anniversary gift from Hank, a family friend helps them out by their request to fix it.

13.title: Thundersense
13.plot: Phoebe gets the ability to sense danger and uses it to impress her classmates; Max tries to get pity gifts from Barb.

14.title: Phoebe's a Clone Now
14.plot: Max must create a clone of Phoebe when she has to be in too many places at once.

15.title: Have an Ice Birthday
15.plot: The siblings get into even more craziness when they want to be trusted to have a normal teenage birthday party, but a frozen Mrs. Wong goes missing.

16.title: Nothing to Lose Sleepover
16.plot: Phoebe is caught using telekinesis to save her first sleepover from becoming a disaster; Phoebe must wear an anklet that prevents her from using her powers.

17.title: Pretty Little Choirs
17.plot: The twins work together to get even with a mean girl at school.

18.title: Paging Dr. Thundermans
18.plot: Max and Phoebe take Billy to the hospital when he hurts his thumb while they are babysitting him. After Max sees a needle and faints, they all must make sure the doctors don't see his brain scan which could expose their powers.

19.title: Up Up and Vacay
19.plot: When the family can't agree on where to go for their dream vacation, they enter a competition as two different teams, boys vs girls, with the winners getting to decide.

20.title: Breaking Dad
20.plot: Hank becomes Max and Phoebe's new science teacher. When he accidentally eats special turkey sandwiches that make him fall asleep at school, the twins must help him out

1.title: Thunder Van
1.plot: Hank brings the Thundervan back from Metroburg for Phoebe to continue her superhero training, but when the kids sneak in to the van for an unauthorized joyride, Hank gives them a ride they will never forget.

2.title: Four Supes and a Baby
2.plot: The children wind up bringing home a real baby instead of Nora's doll.

3.title: Max's Minions
3.plot: Max takes on a group of freshmen to be his minions; Max becomes the victim of a humiliating prank.

4.title: Pheebs Will Rock You
4.plot: Phoebe turns herself into a bad girl to impress Max's new best friend, a rocker who is in Max's new band.

5.title: Haunted Thundermans: Part 1
5.plot: After a super-villain escapes Ghost World on Halloween, the Thundermans head to New Orleans to join forces with the Hathaways and the Prestons to defeat the ghoul.

6.title: Shred It Go
6.plot: Phoebe and Max work together to win tickets to a MKTO concert, but a mishap with the paper-shredder at home appears to destroy the tickets.

7.title: Blue Detective
7.plot: When Max's skin turns blue while out on a date, everybody becomes a suspect as he turns super-sleuth in an effort to find out whodunnit.

8.title: Cheer and Present Danger
8.plot: Phoebe and Cherry's friendship is tested when only one of them makes the cheerleader squad. Meanwhile, Billy and Nora want to keep a stray cat as their own pet.

9.title: Change of Art
9.plot: When Phoebe gets help from Billy on an art project, she learns that he took the piece from a museum.

10.title: Winter Thunderland
10.plot: Max is at his Scroogiest on Christmas Eve, until the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present, and Future show up to put him in the holiday spirit.

11.title: Parents Just Don't Thunderstand
11.plot: Phoebe and Max use one of his devices to make Hank and Barb act like teenagers. Meanwhile, Billy and Nora pretend to be Blobbin's kids so he can get a dog.

12.title: Meet the Evilmans
12.plot: When a retired super-villain, Thunder Man's old nemesis Evilman moves to Hiddenville, Phoebe secretly begins dating his son.

13.title: The Neverfriending Story
13.plot: When Phoebe and Max's friends begin spending time with each other, the twins worry.

14.title: You've Got Fail
14.plot: Max tries to win an epic-fail video contest by submitting a video of Phoebe as she practices ballet.

15.title: Doubles Trouble
15.plot: Phoebe enlists Max's help in a tennis tournament in order to win a membership at a country club.

16.title: Who's Your Mommy
16.plot: Max and Phoebe accidentally sell one of Barb's old superhero utility belts to an Electress fan at the family's garage sale.

17.title: The Amazing Rat Race
17.plot: Max turns Billy into the world's fastest rat in order to win the rat races that he has with members of his band.

18.title: Mall Time Crooks
18.plot: Phoebe and Max head out on a trip to the mall to buy Hank's birthday gift and end up having a run-in with security.

19.title: It's Not What You Link
19.plot: Phoebe's plan to get Max and Link to be friends backfires when Link starts spending more time with Max than her.

20.title: Cape Fear
20.plot: Phoebe and Max Thunderman seem to be regular teenage twins, but they're in a family of superheroes. Phoebe strives to be normal and use her powers for good, but Max embraces the dark side. Can life ever be normal in this family?

21.title: Call of Lunch Duty
21.plot: Phoebe discovers that Max is the person behind the latest rebellious pranks at school.

22.title: One Hit Thunder
22.plot: Max causes a rift between Phoebe and Link when he uses personal information about them in a song.

23.title: The Girl with the Dragon Snafu
23.plot: Phoebe joins the cool group for a class project, but discovers that they do not want to work.

24.title: A Hero Is Born
24.plot: Phoebe and Cherry's friendship is tested when the Thunderman family gets some unexpected news.

1.title: Phoebe vs Max: The Sequel
1.plot: The Thundermans new little sister Chloe has grown and will get a new super power.

2.title: On the Straight and Arrow
2.plot: Cherry asks Max to use his superpowers to help her get her driver's license; Phoebe's jealousy threatens her relationship with her best friend.

3.title: Why You Buggin'?
3.plot: After discovering that Link's ex-girlfriend is a secret super villain, Phoebe enlists Max's help in exposing her rival's true motives.

4.title: Exit Stage Theft
4.plot: Max tries to reestablish his evil reputation by committing petty crimes; Max must choose between his friends and his reputation.

5.title: Are You Afraid of the Park?
5.plot: Max and Phoebe start a fight between Billy and Nora so they can avoid riding a scary roller coaster, but their scheme backfires when the feud escalates.

6.title: Evil Never Sleeps
6.plot: Phoebe's allegiance is torn when she learns that her boyfriend's father might be plotting a return to evil.

7.title: Doppel-Gamers
7.plot: Max and Phoebe realize they have been neglecting their younger siblings when Billy and Nora bond with an outgoing pair of teens at a gamer's convention.

8.title: Floral Support
8.plot: Max uses Phoebe to help retrieve his chronicle of evil deeds from the school's confiscation closet, but breaks her trust to pull off his plan.

9.title: Patch Me If You Can
9.plot: While Phoebe is baby-sitting her boyfriend's brother, the boy discovers his evil side after getting his hands on one of Max's inventions.

10.title: Give Me a Break Up
10.plot: Phoebe's relationship with her superhero boyfriend is put to the test when he is offered an assignment overseas.

11.title: No Country for Old Mentors
11.plot: Despite hoping to be matched with her favorite hero in the Superhero Mentor Program, Phoebe feels pressure to choose her father instead.

12.title: Date Expectations
12.plot: Phoebe distracts Max from interfering with her class project by convincing him that a girl at school wants to date him.

13.title: He Got Game Night
13.plot: When Hank raises the stakes of family game night to a new high, each member of the family will do whatever it takes to win the grand prize.

14.title: Kiss Me Nate
14.plot: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead in the school play opposite a cute boy, so he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role.

15.title: Dog Day After-School
15.plot: Billy and Nora seek Phoebe's help to retrieve their mother's tablet after it is confiscated at school.

16.title: Original Prankster
16.plot: Allison is concerned about Max's pranks and threatens to break up with him if he doesn't stop. Meanwhile, Phoebe and the rest of the family try to be nice and neighborly to Mrs. Wong who in return uses them to service her guests.

17.title: Chutes and Splatters
17.plot: Phoebe must baby-sit President Kuckbutt's trouble-making teen daughter as her latest superhero mission, but the assignment quickly gets out of control.

18.title: I'm Gonna Forget You, Sucka
18.plot: After Cherry accidentally posts a photo revealing the Thundermans' secret, the Hero League forces Phoebe to end the relationship with her best friend.

19.title: Beat the Parents
19.plot: Max is nervous about meeting his girlfriend's parents, so he seeks Phoebe's help to try and win them over.

20.title: Can't Spy Me Love
20.plot: Unexpected consequences arise when Phoebe uses the Hero League's villain search software to track down a cute boy.

21.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Pheebs
21.plot: When Chloe reveals that Max is her favorite sibling, Phoebe tries to reveal Max's true colors by telling a bed time story.

22.title: Aunt Misbehavin'
22.plot: Max and Phoebe track down their aunt for their mom's birthday only to find out that the sisters have been fighting for years.

23.title: Stealing Home
23.plot: Hank and Phoebe think the house has been robbed when they return home and discover the furniture missing, but Max admits he hid everything and forces them to earn their belongings back before Barb discovers the truth.

24.title: Back to School
24.plot: Phoebe and Max return to their elementary school to complete a hero assessment exam and discover that the instructor is a former classmate that Max tormented.

25.title: Thundermans: Secret Revealed
25.plot: Max must finally make a choice between fighting for good or evil when the Villain League threatens to halt Phoebe's superhero ascension and destroy the Thundermans.

locations: Stage 25, Paramount Studios - 5555 Melrose Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Meet The Thundermans, a typical suburban family that happens to have astounding superpowers. At the center of the action are the 14-year-old Thunderman twins, who share the same bathroom, the same school, and the same annoying little siblings. Their only difference? The sister is a super student with a super sunny disposition who super looks forward to being a superhero someday, and her twin brother is a super villain.
imdb.title: The Thundermans
plot: Meet _The Thundermans_ (qv), a typical suburban family that happens to have astounding superpowers. At the center of the action are the 14-year-old Thunderman twins, who share the same bathroom, the same school, and the same annoying little siblings. Their only difference? The sister is a super student with a super sunny disposition who super looks forward to being a superhero someday, and her twin brother is a super villain.::Nickelodeon
synopsis: The Thundermans are a typical suburban family who happen to have astounding superpowers. At the center of the action are the 14-year-old Thunderman twins, Max (Jack Griffo) and Phoebe (Kira Kosarin), who share the same bathroom, the same school and the same annoying younger siblings. Their only difference? Phoebe is a super student with a super sunny disposition who super looks forward to being a superhero someday, and Max aspires to become a super villain.
